## NonProjectConfigurationFile.tryLoadConfigurationFile() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This function is identical to [NonProjectConfigurationFile.loadConfigurationFile()](./heft-config-file.nonprojectconfigurationfile.loadconfigurationfile.md)<></>, except that it returns `undefined` instead of throwing an error if the configuration file cannot be found.

**Signature:**

```typescript
tryLoadConfigurationFile(terminal: ITerminal, filePath: string): TConfigurationFile | undefined;
```
